d.name: Palmier
d.phase: Grrr, I've had enough! [This collar stops us doing what we want.] [These guys don't even do anything about it either, these Dorogons who think they're our masters! And on this island, nothing ever changes... It sucks!]
You get as far away from him as possible, he seems furious but you don't know why...
I want to exlpore this world! I can see that there is something below us!
d.a: There are lots of places to go!
d.phase: One day I'll get off this wretched island, and I'll explore the whole world! I'll be the greatest adventurer of all-time!
Despite your encouragement, Palmier still seems angry, Could this be what they call the rebellious years?
He understood what you said, but he doesn't know what to say... Clearly this word hasn't had any real effect on him.

d.name: Palmier
d.phase: Grrr, I've had enough - it's all getting too much for me! [It's a nice idea, being able to say we are free, but if you can't leave the island without your parents until you're 18, what's the point?] [...Take it to the streets, brothers!]
